name: Aurelio Rossetti
subtitle: Sr. Director of Financial Planning and Analysis at World Fuel Services
about: Forward-thinking financial executive with years of business development and financial analysis experience. Fiscally minded, proficient in numerous applications and systems, and motivated by efficiency. Driven and goal-oriented with a demonstrative capacity to provide comprehensive, executive-level operations, budgets, and analysis. Looking forward to the opportunity to be challenged, and consider myself a life long learner.  Naturally driven and motivated, able to achieve maximum impacts – regardless of obstacles, requiring minimum resources and expense.
experiences:
Most recently, I have been FP&A Sr. Director with World Fuel Services. I liaised with senior leadership and stakeholder teams to ensure that we are driving the business forward with minimal expenditures. Responsible for collaborative reporting, recommendations. Also served as Sr. Manager Financial Planning & Analysis (2015-2017), Manager Financial Planning and Analysis (2013-2015), Sr. Internal Auditor (2011-2013), Financial Operations – London (2010-2011),  and Financial Analyst (2009-2010).
•	Designed and implemented system that strengthened company wide financial performance, budgeting/forecasting process, and the integrity of financial reporting.
•	Implemented monthly MD&A (Management Discussion & Analysis) packages.
•	Created and maintained financial models for ROIC analysis on consolidated results with inspired potential outcomes.
•	Responsible for reviewing and validating $12B revenue budget across 3 different continents and multiple currencies. 
•	Performed financial due diligence on multiple acquisitions in North America for a total of +$2B in revenue in acquired businesses and contributed to financial integration and accomplishment of synergies with existing organic businesses.
•	Actively participated in the company restructuring process identifying and executing cost reduction opportunities and improving Opex to GP ratio by 8-10%.
Sr. Manager Financial Planning and Analysis
